casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Purcell Orlando JONES, Jr. No. 10P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. M. Lynne Weaver, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Purcell Orlando Jones, Jr., Brunswick, for Jones, Purcell Orlando (Jr.). N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of January 2016 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
